item.title: Recap of Scala tutorial
item.description: A cheatsheet that gets you started. The original tutorial can be found here Main function The normal version: object Hello { def main(args: Array[String]) = { println("Hello, world") } } The version that extends App trait object Hello extends App { println("Hello, world") } // To access args. object Hello extends App { if (args.size == 0) println("Hello, you") else println("Hello, " + args(0)) } As you may notice: no ; needed as ending in Scala.
